judyle.comment: after reviewing the discussion i believe masks in classrooms will keep our students safe it addresses a current health crisis and aligns with local guidelines vote yes

jonnoalcaro.comment: considering the guidance from dr. haas and dr. katz in conjunction with the updated albemarle county public health department directive and local data regarding transmission rate we really do need to take responsible action to protect both staff and students while supporting their safe return to learning spaces a mask mandate in this moment makes sense to me so vote yes

grahampaige.comment:
yes. The motion passes seven zero and now it's official business time. I'm going to read aloud again from the minutes page of our agenda. Are there any questions about it? Could I get a motion?
